product_name: Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Thermal-Lite Bottle with Pocket
long_description: The Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Thermal-Lite Bottle with Pocket keeps liquids hot or cold and a holds a few essentials right at your fingertips. Neoprene insulator sleeve is easily removed. Low-profile, bounce-free zippered pouch provides easy access to essentials and energy snacks. Hydraform bottle is ergonomically designed to let the hand relax in a natural position. Strap easily adjusts to fit any hand size. The Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Thermal-Lite Bottle with Pocket features a 100% BPA-free polyethylene bottle.
